Title: Tetsuwan Atom
Description:
['In the year 2003, Professor Tenma is distraught when his son Tobio is killed in a car accident. He loses himself in his latest project, creating Atom, a robot boy programmed to be forever good.', '
', '
', '
', '
Upset that his Tobio-substitute can never grow up, Tenma sells Atom to Ham Egg, the cruel ringmaster of a robot circus. Atom meets the kindly Professor Ochanomizu, who adopts him, inspires him to become a crusader against evil, and eventually builds him a robot "sister," Uran.', '
', '
', '
', '
(Source: The Anime Encyclopedia)']
Related: ['Adaptation: Tetsuwan Atom', 'Alternative version: Astro Boy: Tetsuwan Atom', 'Summary: Tetsuwan Atom: Uchuu no Yuusha', 'Prequel: Atom: The Beginning']
Voices: ['Shimizu, Mari', 'Katsuta, Hisashi', 'Yokomori, Hisashi', 'Mutou, Reiko', 'Yajima, Masaaki', 'Ebata, Takashi', 'Komiyama, Kiyoshi']
Staff: [['Tezuka, Osamu', 'Director, Episode Director, Script, Original Creator'], ['Tomino, Yoshiyuki', 'Episode Director, Script'], ['Dezaki, Osamu', 'Episode Director, Storyboard, Key Animation, In-Between Animation'], ['Rintaro', 'Episode Director']]
